info.title: Microsoft StaffHub
info.description: Microsoft StaffHub is a cloud-based platform that works across all your devices. It enables firstline workers and their managers to manage time, communicate with their teams, and share content.

get.summary: List all members in a team
get.x-ms-summary: List all members in a team
get.description: This operation lists all the members of a given team.

get.summary: Get a team member by ID
get.x-ms-summary: Get a team member by ID
get.description: This operation gets a member of a team by their unique ID.

post.summary: When a new member is added to the team
post.x-ms-summary: When a new member is added to the team
post.description: This operation triggers when a new member is added to the team.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add a new member to the team.

post.summary: When a member is updated in the team
post.x-ms-summary: When a member is updated in the team
post.description: This operation triggers when a team member is updated.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, update a member in the team.

post.summary: When a member is deleted from the team
post.x-ms-summary: When a member is deleted from the team
post.description: This operation triggers when a member is deleted from the team.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, delete a member in the team.

get.summary: List all groups in a team
get.x-ms-summary: List all groups in a team
get.description: This operation lists all groups within a team.
This operation lists all teams that the user is a member of.
This operation returns details for a team using the team's unique ID.

get.summary: Determine the location of the user's data
get.x-ms-summary: Determine the location of the user's data

get.description: Get the account of the current logged in user.
This operation returns details of a schedule using the schedule's unique ID.

post.summary: When a schedule is published for the team
post.x-ms-summary: When a schedule is published for the team
post.description: This operation triggers when a schedule is published for the team.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, publish a schedule.

get.description: This operation returns all shift requests for a team using the team's unique ID.
This operation returns details for a shift request using the request's unique ID.

parameters.description: Unique ID of the shift request.
parameters.name: shiftRequestId

post.summary: When a new shift request is created
post.x-ms-summary: When a new shift request is created
post.description: This operation triggers when a new swap, offer or time off shift request is created.

default.description: default response for a trigger subscription

post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a shift request.

post.summary: When a shift request is updated
post.x-ms-summary: When a shift request is updated
post.description: This operation triggers when a swap, offer or time off shift request is updated.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, update a shift request.

post.summary: When a shift request is deleted
post.x-ms-summary: When a shift request is deleted
post.description: This operation triggers when a swap, offer or time off shift request is deleted.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, delete a shift request.

post.summary: Approve or deny a time off request (managers only)
post.x-ms-summary: Approve or deny a time off request (managers only)
post.description: This operation allows managers to approve or deny a time off request.

parameters.name: shiftRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the time off request

post.summary: Approve a shift swap or hand off request (managers only)
post.x-ms-summary: Approve a shift swap or hand off request (managers only)
post.description: This operation allows managers to approve a shift swap or hand off request.

parameters.name: shiftRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the shift swap or hand off request

get.description: This operation returns all shifts assigned to members of a team

post.summary: When a new shift is added to the team
post.x-ms-summary: When a new shift is added to the team
post.description: This operation triggers when a new shift is added to a member of a team.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a new shift.

post.summary: When a shift is updated in a team
post.x-ms-summary: When a shift is updated in a team
post.description: This operation triggers when a shift is updated for a member of a team.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, update any shift.

post.summary: When a shift is deleted in a team
post.x-ms-summary: When a shift is deleted in a team
post.description: This operation triggers when a shift is deleted for a member of a team.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, delete a shift.

get.description: This operation returns details for a shift using the shift's unique ID.

parameters.name: shiftId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the shift.

get.description: This operation returns the list of time off reasons associated with a team.

items.description: Properties associated with a single team member.

userId.description: The unique ID of the user in the directory.

firstName.description: The first name of the team member.

lastName.description: The last name of the team member.

fullName.description: The full name of the team member.

email.description: The email address of the team member.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the team member.

isManager.description: Whether or not the team member is a manager of the team.

state.description: The status of the user's membership in the team.

items.description: Properties associated with a single team.

id.description: The unique ID of the team.

handle.description: The team handle (unique user-readable team ID)

location.description: The location of the team (this is the name of the department)

countryCode.description: A two letter country code (ISO standard 3166) of the team. This is used to to enforce license restrictions for the users in this team

groupDriveId.description: The identifier for the drive associated to the group provisioned for this team.

groupId.description: The identifier to the group provisioned for this team.

id.description: The unique ID of the team.

timeZone.description: The timeZone Olson Code of the Team.

publishedShifts.description: The list of published shifts for a team.

items.description: Properties associated with a single shift.

id.description: The unique ID of the shift.

teamId.description: The ID of the team the shift is in

memberId.description: The ID of the team member that the shift is assigned to.

startTime.description: The start time of the shift.

endTime.description: The end time of the shift.

notes.description: The notes assigned to the shift.

timeOffReasonId.description: The ID of the time off reason for a shift (if of type Absence).

unpublishedShifts.description: The list of unpublished shifts for a team.

memberId.description: The ID of the team member that the shift is assigned to.

timeOffReasonId.description: The ID of the time off reason for a shift (if shift is of type Absence).
